component_locations.PageTitle: top left of the content page
component_locations.ProjectStarCTA: top below pagetitle takes full width of the center section
component_locations.InfoCard: mid takes full width of the center section
component_locations.Table: top below of the center section takes full width of it
component_locations.ChartCard1: bottom left above projectstarcta of the center section takes 1/2 width
component_locations.ChartCard2: bottom right above projectstarcta of the center section takes 1/2 width

functionality.table_pagination: a feature that allows the table to be paginated
